details.name: Outstanding
details.intro: Presented information in logical, interesting sequence, which the audience followed and engaged into

details.name: Good
details.intro: Presented information in logical sequence, which the audience followed

details.name: Fair
details.intro: Audience had at times difficulty in following the information because of interruptions to the logic flow

details.name: To be improved
details.intro: Sequence of information was hard to follow, could not be understood logically

details.name: Outstanding
details.intro: Showed full understanding of the product and used elaboration and backing research to promote its relevance

details.name: Good
details.intro: Showed adequate understanding of the product and provided good amount of details on its relevance

details.name: Fair
details.intro: Showed basic understanding of the product, provided some information on its relevance or novelty

details.name: To be improved
details.intro: Showed only partial understanding of the product and its relevance

details.name: Outstanding
details.intro: Visuals effectively reinforced and gave more context to the presentation, slides were visually appealing

details.name: Good
details.intro: Use of visuals related to the presentation, clear and visually pleasant slides

details.name: Fair
details.intro: Slides replicated the presentation, which was simply read aloud, could be more visually appealing

details.name: To be improved
details.intro: Slides were unrelated to the presentation and/or cluttered, spelling/grammar mistakes.

details.name: Outstanding
details.intro: All speakers exhibited superior eye contact during presentation and rarely referred to a script

details.name: Good
details.intro: Most speakers exhibited good eye contact throughout the presentation, and occasionally referred to a script

details.name: Fair
details.intro: Most speakers exhibited limited eye contact throughout the presentation, and often referred to a script

details.name: To be improved
details.intro: All speakers didn’t maintain eye contact with the audience and remained tied to a written script

details.name: Outstanding
details.intro: All speakers used a clear voice and effectively conveyed their ideas

details.name: Good
details.intro: Most speakers’ voices were clear, and clearly communicated ideas

details.name: Fair
details.intro: Audience had difficulty understanding some speakers

details.name: To be improved
details.intro: Most speakers mumbled, and spoke too quietly for audience to hear

details.name: Outstanding
details.intro: Time keeping was spot on with no prompting, without appearing rushed or stretched. Turn taking was seamless

details.name: Good
details.intro: Time keeping was good, with some reminders. Speakers took turns well

details.name: Fair
details.intro: Speakers needed to skip parts to end on time, turn taking at times disorganised and time consuming

details.name: To be improved
details.intro: Presentation needed to be cut short/ended up too early. Speakers seemed unsure about their turn

details.name: Outstanding
details.intro: All questions were answered satisfactorily and competently

details.name: Good
details.intro: Most questions were addressed to a good extent.

details.name: Fair
details.intro: Some questions were left partially unanswered.

details.name: To be improved
details.intro: Questions were not addressed, answers were too vague

textField.label: Summarise briefly the question you asked
Add any general feedback you want to send the group
Please add any further comments for the lecturer
